CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7, 1959, pg. 2, reads: "Mrs. Kirk's Workers - Carrying on for Mrs. Sarah Kirk in Sixth District of the 13th Ward, in Tuesday's elections were Bill White and Mrs. Georgia Paylor, center, surrounded by two unidentified workers.  After Joe Watts, elected committeeman in the district, voted against her for ward chairman last year, Mrs. Kirk refused to recognize him, and turned election paraphernalia over to her own select group."
TitMainTitle: Georgia Paylor, and three men, including Bill White, standing in front of garage doors with political campaign signs
